subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Patrick Kane’s Superman cape and Zdeno Chara’s blistering slap shot were not enough to beat Daniel Alfredsson and his team stocked with hometown favorites in the N.H.L. All-Star skills competition.
snippet: Patrick Kane’s Superman cape and Zdeno Chara’s blistering slap shot were not enough to beat Daniel Alfredsson and his team stocked with hometown favorites in the N.H.L. All-Star skills competition.
